name: IQEDge
description: Learning made easier.  The heart of education exists in the process of teacher and pupil learning together, drawing forth the pupils potential and raising the pupil to eventually surpass the teacher.Visualize with us even the most difficult concepts and prepare for the toughest of exams effectively. Our treasure of knowledge put together with our technology brings to you the finest tool for self learning.  Features:  1. Researched content - Bringing to you the content which is crisp, concise and clear, created through rigorous efforts of professionals and teachers together.  2. Visual aids - To assist you in the self learning, our video lectures have well thought out visual aids making the learning easy, fun and effective.  3. Modular learning - All the courses are divided into small modules to make learning flexible.  4. Doubt resolving - The app itself has the doubt section where the doubts can be posted and will be resolved by the faculty himself/herself.  Our vision is to make learning easy and fun for every student helping them realize their dreams
